product_name: Innersense Organic BeautyI Create Hold Styling Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackRefillableInnersense Organic Beauty's I Create Hold Styling Gel is a honey based styling gel for structured hold and healthy shine.
details: DetailsBenefitsAchieves shapeDefinition and firm holdAdds shineKey IngredientsNettle and Eucalyptus increase shine, flexibility and strengthRooibos Tea adds antioxidant rejuvenation and careFormulated WithoutPhthalatesEthoxylatesSulfatesSilicones1,4 dioxaneParabensPetro compoundsPropylene and butylene glycolPEGMEATEAMIAEDTA artificial dyesSynthetic fragrancesItem 2572253How To UseTake a deep breath and become centered. Section wet hair and distribute 1-2 pumps into fingertips, raking from roots to ends. Diffuse, air or blow dry to define texture and style. On dry hair, apply 1 pump to fingertips for structure and hold.IngredientsWater, Aqua- EAU, Aloe Barbadensis Gel*, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Maltodextrin Copolymer, Potassium Hydroxide, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Calcium Gluconate, Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Phytate, Glycerin*, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract*, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract*, Aspalathus Linearis Leaf Extract*, Honey Extract*, Limonene+.*Certified Organic+A natural component of essential oilsShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Take a deep breath and become centered. Section wet hair and distribute 1-2 pumps into fingertips, raking from roots to ends. Diffuse, air or blow dry to define texture and style. On dry hair, apply 1 pump to fingertips for structure and hold.
ingredients: Limonene+.*Certified Organic+A natural component of essential oils

reviews.headline: This product has been a game changer for my haircare
reviews.comments: I've been using this clean beauty brand gel for 3 years now and I see no need for any other gel. It's the only gel that has worked for my straight,fine, heavy hair. I'm 64 and would describe my hair as being neutral, meaning it isn't dry or oily. This product has actually replaced the hairsprays I used to use which I was never quite satisfied with. I'm also thrilled that I'm able to buy this in my local Ulta store. So happy they carry the Innersense line.

reviews.headline: excellent for tight curls
reviews.comments: this provides beautiful curl definition for tight curls

reviews.headline: Instantly destroyed my 2c / 3a curls....
reviews.comments: I hate writing bad reviews and I really wanted to love this stuff because of the clean ingredients, but holy cow it DESTROYED my hair within one use and I wanted to save others the experience. It is SO thick and heavy so I was like great, this will hold well. What it actually does is clump your curls in a really weird and unnatural way, dry them out completely, leave tons of frizz, and make you feel like you have to clarify every time you use it. WOOF. Also made my scalp really itchy after only three uses. Switching back to Ouidad, thanks!

reviews.headline: Great hold
reviews.comments: Love it. Great hold. Smells good.

reviews.headline: REFILL
reviews.comments: i'm so glad the refill of this gel exists! this is a stellar and effective styling gel for coarse textured curls.

reviews.headline: A cast-building, curl-defining classic
reviews.comments: Create Hold delivers flexible but strong definition without crunch or buildup. It layers effortlessly over curl creams or stylers like Curl Memory and works beautifully in dry climates when used with a leave-in. Cast forms cleanly, holds through multiple days, and rarely flakes. Lightweight feel, medium-to-strong hold, and refresh-friendly. Perfect for low-porosity or glycerin-sensitive curls.

reviews.headline: Not Worth Buying
reviews.comments:
When used on tight curls, this product seems like it will provide long-lasting hold and moisture.
However, it left my hair feeling stiff and dry, even when paired with a lightweight leave-in or curl cream. It also requires a lot of water for refreshing the curls.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: So I've tried to give this gel a chance multiple times because I've heard such good reviews about it. I used it by itself and even mixed it with mousse and I still don't like it. Don't get me wrong the day 1 curls are beautiful but after day 3 my hair feels dry and is flaking all over my clothes. I'm used to my wash n go's lasting at least a week.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Gel for my 3c/4a hair
reviews.comments:
I have curly 3c/4a hair and I love this gel. Currently, I layer it over a light leave in and then go over it with a cream. The cast is firm, but breaks pretty easily with oil scrunching. Leaves my hair super defined, shiny, and soft/touchable. Also, it holds up even in humidity/ rain for me! 

There's a bit of a learning curve with this gel though. You need to experiment using it with water. I style in the shower, and use two pumps per section  of hair (I section my hair in about 8 parts). I emulsify in my hands with a little water and then smooth/rake into my hair. I've noticed that the less water I use, the firmer the hold is (which you may not want) and the more difficult it is to smooth through the hair. So just keep that in mind.

reviews.headline: Love love love, but stains!
reviews.comments: This is my holy grail hair product. It leaves a cast, but is easily scrunched out, or goes away after sleeping. I can make my washes last 4-5 days with this. Only downside is that it stains clothes like crazy. Dedicate a shirt to hair wash days and you will be fine!

reviews.headline: Love love love, but stains!
reviews.comments: This is my holy grail hair product. It leaves a cast, but is easily scrunched out, or goes away after sleeping. I can make my washes last 4-5 days with this. Only downside is that it stains clothes like crazy. Dedicate a shirt to hair wash days and you will be fine!

reviews.headline: God Send!
reviews.comments: I have ccca alopecia, most products irritate my scalp. Someone suggested this gel, it holds and shines with no irritation. Pricey but worth it I guess..

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this…
reviews.comments: I saw a instagram ad for this and I was sold! I purchased this and their hairspray. The scent is beautiful… the hold X(terrible, there's no hold)- the texture X (feels waxy and like hay)-. Its not even 3 days in and my head is so OILY and I have the worst buildup and dandruff. It's embarrassing!! This was my 5th time trying to love it and I personally don't think it's worth it! And don't get me started on the frizz. Back to the drawing board

reviews.headline: Best results so far
reviews.comments: I have 2a-2c waves, thick, frizzy, graying hair that can easily get dry. I have been struggling with far too much trial and error in wavy hair techniques and products. Ridiculous. Layering product upon product does not work for me; it weighs down the waves. Some products seem to do a good job initially, but have no real hold that lasts beyond an hour. This gel may be a keeper. I washed with Innervision Moisture Bath and Conditioner. Then I used the bowl method to evenly distribute a leave in conditioner, scrunching the water out. I used only a pump of the gel for each side of my soaking wet hair, emulsified with water and evenly applied with "prayer hands," and then scrunched. Then I used a cotton T-shirt to scrunch out the excess water, and diffused until about 85% dry. Once it was dry, I scrunched out the minimal crunch. It clumped nicely and is SO light. It's so wavy, it's maybe an inch shorter! It's a little frizzy, but a little bit of frizz isn't a deal-breaker for me. It has been several hours and it still looks good. Not sure how it will look tomorrow, but I'm please right now.

reviews.headline: Wanted to Love it; but it's awful
reviews.comments: I initially bought this in July 2024. I had heard such good things about the brand and this gel and I was extremely excited to try it.  And on wash day my curls were amazing. They honestly were; one friend described my curls as "effortlessly elegant" after using this gel.  But the next day my curls were flat and frizzy. When I tried to refresh with water my hair felt like straw; I literally could not add water to it for a refresh. Next wash day when I went to wash out the gel my hair felt hideous. It felt dry,dirty, and coated. I felt like I had to clarify my hair and use a deep conditioner just to fix what this product did to it. But the wash day results were so amazing, I kept trying to "fix it". I paired it with other, more moisturizing products. Nothing helped. I waited a few months and tried again in January 2025 thinking somehow winter might help the product work better. No luck. I used this product 8 times. And all 8 times my hair was completely destroyed the next day. I so desperately wanted to find a way for this to work because the wash day results were amazing; but the after effects were so bad. I honestly feel that if I kept using this product I would permanently damage my curls. So I finally gave up and tossed it in the trash. Never again. And, honestly, I probably will not try any other Innersense products because of how awful this gel is. .

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: love it for my hair

reviews.headline: Base gel
reviews.comments: I use this gel as the very first product in my styling routine while in the shower and with soaking wet hair. It works great holding water/moisture and minizing the time spent styling my hair outside of the shower

reviews.headline: Not gunky
reviews.comments: This is the best feel for thick, coarse, curly hair.   Not sticky at all.   Not a lot of residue

reviews.headline: STICKY in the worst way
reviews.comments: Terrible gel - sticky and flakes when dry. Don't recommend for any hair type, my curls hated it.

reviews.headline: Miracle Product
reviews.comments: As someone with 4C hair and seborrheic dermatitis I'm always in search of a product that makes my weekly wash day shorter. I just tried this gel out (my first gel that I've used in a while) for a wash and go and I'm stunned. After detangling, shampooing, and deep conditioning with a LOT of water, I worked a palm-sized amount into my hair from near root to tip in sections. The key for using this with a kinkier texture is massaging the product with generous amounts of water until it foams up and your curl pattern is more visible (and then topping off with more sprays of water!) Then diffusing to the point where you can air dry  I'm so happy that I purchased this because this just made my life so much easier!

Heaven
media.caption: Do you see the definition and bounce?!? My hair moves y'all!! This is after I blow dried with a diffuser for an hour.

media.headline: I love this product so much!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have fine textured, naturally wavy, low density hair. I've tried a ton of gels and none of them compares to this one, performance wise, smell wise, ingredients wise, or texture wise at all. This styling gel has everything you need in order to make your precious tresses look their absolute best all year round. Now, even though I have wavy hair, this styling gel can be used on all hairtypes and hair textures. You're will see your hair transform into what you've always wanted it to be versus settling with using inferior products that could never give you all that your hair's always needed. You're getting natural goodness in a bottle that is totally safe and non-toxic, a product that truly represents clean beauty just like every product in the Innsersense Organic Beauty line. Because the products are made with mostly water and have small amounts of other ingredients thrown in, you are instead getting a product where there is less water and the main ingredients are put in at high enough amounts to really do the job that they're supposed to and help to give you greater manageability, shine, and control to your hair whether it's straight, wavy, curly, coily, or a glorious combination of any of these hairtypes. If you've ever been anti-gel because the gels that you've tried have either left your hair feeling as dry as a desert or greasy, this will definitely change all that. After trying this gel for the 1st time, I was instantly hooked. It's the only product that I use to style my hair with, and it doesn't leave my hair bone dry and starved for moisture or limp and greasy feeling ever. It give me perfect looking waves everytime, plus it works very well at slicking back my hair when I choose to wear it in a bun too. I highly recommend giving this product a try, as it is a major game changer for ones hair - guaranteed.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Styling Gel Ever Created Period!
